QuestData.Title: Tukka-Tuk
QuestData.Description: You are making a name for yourself, $n. I received a challenge from one of our more skilled competitors. He believes you are not as strong as you seem.$b$bHis name is Tukka-Tuk, the hozen. If you've ever fought against hozen before, you know that their apparent juvenility belies their battle acumen. Good luck.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Hasn't lost once in his last ten matches.
